import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function ProductCards() { const [Product,SetProduct]=useState([]); console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_API+'/v1/products/getproduct') useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/v1/products/getproduct') .then(res=>res.json()) .then(res=>SetProduct(res)); },[]) return (

); }
